subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4 restructuring
msgSnippet: ... This RunWith annotation offers an alternative to the possibility of decorating a test class TestSuite in JUnit3 but does not offer a solution to decorating
messageBody:
Kent Beck wrote:
> * RunWith -- class annotation directing JUnit 4 to use a customer runner
> (was called Factory)
>
>

This RunWith annotation offers an alternative to the possibility of
decorating a test class TestSuite in JUnit3 but does not offer a
solution to decorating the individual test methods.

Lets say I code a custom Runner to run each test in it's own classloader
but otherwise I want all the other standard JUnit4 annotations to be
respected. I can reuse the TestIntrospector and TestMethodRunner classes
(although they are in an internal package). But there is still code in
TestClassRunner to do with exception handling that I will have to duplicate.

- Neil
